extendedInfo.description: â Throw the newest item at the Jerk. Mess him up so bad, that he'll need Vitamin "see" âThere's a Jerk in every office. A know-it-all, overachiever who comes in early, stays late and kisses up to the boss. Exact revenge on âthat guyâ with Office Jerk: grab whatever you can find, and hurl it at him!The Office Jerk can only take so much - find out how much by throwing:    â Fire Extinguisher (NEW ITEM)        â Juice Box     â Cheesy Button    â Snappy Mouse Trap    â Fish Bowl, complete with Goldfish    â Sloppy, Spicy Taco    â Sweet, Vanilla Ice Cream Cone    â Nice, Blue Water balloon    â Stick O' Dynamite    â Yummy Cupcake with Sprinkles    â Crumpled Piece of Paper    â Shiny Red Stapler    â Suction Cup Dart - Always Classic, Always Funny    â Pipe Wrench    â Soda Pop!...and a whole bunch more, plus mystery items! And we're adding new items all the time.Don't just sit back and take it: pay it back. Grab whatever feels right, and fling it at his head or shoulder - or go right for the face! Tap the desk organizer and see what other items you can rain down on that office meanie. Finally wipe that smirk off his face, in this feel-good app from Fluik Entertainment.    â Hit the Jerk with 30+ items    â Unlock hilarious reactions for each item    â Discover tons of environment interactions    â Master the Office Jerk checklist    â Earn Daily Rewards    â Complete Daily Challenges    â Achievements Galore!âââââ âLove this game! Installed it about a year ago...it's still as entertaining as the day I installed it.ââ®â®â®â®â® âGreat way to get out anger without hurting anyone other that Office Jerk. What a jerk!ââââââ âFun fun and super fun. A most played game for all grades and agesââ¤ Play Office Jerk today!âLikeâ Office Jerk on Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/OfficeJerkGet FREE in-game Coins when Office Jerk gets 100,000 âLikesâ on Facebook!___________________________Office Jerk is brought to you by Fluik Entertainment, makers of wicked-fun mobile games such as Office Zombie, Plumber Crack and Grumpy Bears. Browse all our games on Google Play - https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=FluikFollow @FluikGames on Twitter for awesome game announcements and other updates.NOTE:To help keep Office Jerk awesome, please send any bug reports or complaints directly to us, instead of posting them in your app reviews. We can reply to app reviews on Google Play, but we're more likely to respond if you post all your bugs or suggestions on our Facebook fan page, http://www.facebook.com/OfficeJerk, or email them to us at support@fluik.com

reviews.title: BS
reviews.comment: I bought the game now they took it down to put up the free version only. So they take our money and give nothing in return
reviews.author: Lucas G

reviews.title: Sweet
reviews.comment: 5 stars.but please add a bowling ball 2 items list.and maybe a book. :)
reviews.author: Noreen Kajeer

reviews.title: Apple vs. Android
reviews.comment: Throughout playing both versions, I realized some items are missing from both versions vs. each other and I wish all items could be on both, AT LEAST Android anyway!!! Not to mention, I have completed everything and the game is starting to get boring making me think to uninstall it. Not to mention that the new mpoints page is set up wrong in my eyes and I hate it. I\'m not happy about the \"random restart\" bug and I have the FASTEST MOBILE PROCESSOR EVER (NvidiaTegra4). The ads are also annoying, they pop up and never go away keeping you from playing by freezing everything but the ad. The graphics are worse on android than apple, why. Unhappy with the game, I\'m ashamed.
reviews.author: Trevor Woodard

reviews.title: Good but annoying
reviews.comment: Really good app but hard to understand currency and then hard to earn coins please make better!
reviews.author: Jenna B

reviews.title: COMPLETE B.S.
reviews.comment: The coins should be earned for completing the achievements not by having to give out all my personal information to god knows who. And if ppl are as stupid as i was and attempt it to earn a few measly coins then the least you can do is give those coins. Since now I\'m sure i will be having numerous different companies hounding me, i would like to at least have my reward. EPIC FLUIK FAIL
reviews.author: Shayne Redcay

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: My lil boy loves this game!! He can\'t stop laughing the whole time he is playing!! Love it!!

reviews.title: Its a very amazing game!!
reviews.comment: It brings out the me who wants to hurt people and so when I play this game I have a way to relieve stress

reviews.title: Bummer
reviews.comment: I\'ve loved this game until today. Completed my daily challenge 6 times but not reading right. Annoyed
reviews.author: Katie Carter

reviews.title: Thumbs up!
reviews.comment: Love the game!  It\'s great for killing a little time when your riding (not driving) in a car, or waiting for your turn at various appointments.  It loads fast and is easy to stop in mid game.  The only complaint I have is when trying to earn extra coins by taking surveys.  I have taken two lengthy surveys promising 25 to 45 coins. However the coins were never added to my bank. ?????
reviews.author: Darleen Horn

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Still intstalling but I played it on my sisters kimdle and it is an addictive fun game and helps relieve stress well done great app :)

reviews.title: Help
reviews.comment: It stopped working! Help I hav tried everything.

reviews.title: Great :)
reviews.comment: I got this yesterday and I love it. My sister has it on her iphone. On my phone though (samsung galaxy stellar) it froze a couple times and crashed. Its still a fun game. I just restarted my phone when it happened and it straightened out.

reviews.title: mPoints
reviews.comment: Without mPoints, this game is pointless. Played every day to earn points.  Now it\'s getting deleted and receiving a poor rating.  It\'s been real.  Fluik FAIL :-(
